title: Three Romances From A Man's Heart
description: "Author Tom Winton's words captivate; painting vivid scenes which leap from the page to the mind, exciting every sense with tantalizing description. He masterfully weaves the reader in and out between a dream-like state and harsh reality."  A boxed set of two novels and a novella from bestselling author Tom Winton.  BEYOND NOSTALGIA -- Dean Cassidy looks back on a life filled with hardship and remembers Theresa Wayman, the bright spark that lit up his world when he was eighteen. Twenty-four years later, when they're both married, Dean and Theresa reunite. Is it too late?  A SECOND CHANCE IN PARADISE -- The story of a man betrayed by the love of his life seeks solace by moving to the Florida Keys. Though he's not ready for it, he finds both romance and danger in the land of swaying palms and gentle breezes.  WITHIN A MAN'S HEART -- Four years after burying his young wife, sales executive Christian Crews hopes to find emotional peace when he moves from New York to New Hampshire. Though the last thing on his mind is a romantic relationship, Chris soon finds himself falling for Gina Elkin, a woman with a heart as big as the surrounding mountains.
author: Tom Winton
